title: King of Clubs Mordekaiser is one of the most fantastic skins I have ever seen.
body:
This thread is literally just mindlessly praising King of Clubs Mordekaiser, and Riot in general. If you don't like it, please just go without a word. ANYWAY, unto the topic at hand.

King of Clubs Mordekaiser is a visually fantastic skin. He looks stunning (to me.) His coloring is perfect, his mace is amazing, and that fucking cape makes all the other Mordekaiser skins pale in comparison. Riot, I want you to give the man (or women) who thought of and made this skin a reality a raise. Because god damn, it is just great. And for 750 RP too? You just had to make it even better didn't you?

replies.body: I feel the metal rendering that it was giving could be changed to a different texture to make it look like polished metal so it has a shine to it like the Full metal pantheon skin does, and since hes a king it should be even more so shiny as a form of status for mord.

Dude you forgot the best part.

It fixed his pizza feet!
